vocable.name: I'm at Camden School for Girls.
So he isn't a baby like George.
Why don't you buy it anyway?
to look forward to doing sth

I'd like to (= I would like to)
not that high on my list

I took the team on whole.

On your marks, get set, go!
on the one hand … on the other hand

to put sth on the line (irr)
to be the talk of the town (irr)

to be keen to do sth (irr)
to continue doing sth/to do sth
